org.apache.river.jeri.internal.mux

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.jeri.internal.mux.Session

  • final class Session
extends Object
    A Session represents a single session of a multiplexed connection, for either client-side and server-side perspective. The particular role (CLIENT or SERVER) is indicated at construction time.
    Author:
    Sun Microsystems, Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • traceSupression

        static boolean traceSupression()
        This method prevents a SecurityException from being thrown for a client proxy that doesn't have permission to read the property. When this is the case, the secure trace supression option is chosen. This is not optimised, because exception conditions are exceptional.
